infos.value: ...Skahal, how fare your wounds?
The medicine has stopped the bleeding. It will do…for now.
You must return to your village as soon as possible and rest...
...I am sorry, Loreila.
You had to betray Rundall because of me...
You have nothing to apologize for.
There is no just cause for Rundall to invade Ovis.
I joined Rundall to support my clan, but I can bear it no longer...
The outcome of this battle was decided when it began.
Yes, I know.
To think that there are those in Gouga who look upon Saiga with such hostility...
It is Mariale.
She thinks I stole the seat of chief from her. And...
She knew Saiga would help Ovis and thus offered support to Rundall.
...Yes.
Mariale said that we needed to ally with Rundall to defeat Saiga.
Alas, my power was not enough to stop her...
But if this battle ends...
I am certain everyone could consider our village's future with a level head.
Nothing will be born of a battle with our fellow shinobi...
But what if...you cannot gain their understanding?
W-well...
Would you consider leaving Gouga and coming to Saiga?
What...?
I have no doubts you would do well in Saiga.
Actually, I think you are even better suited to it than Gouga. So...
Thank you, Skahal.
But...I want to do everything in my power for Gouga.
It is my home, after all.
I understand.
I wish we could stay like this forever.
...As do I.
But I must go. The villagers will worry.
Can you make it back to Saiga alone?
Yes, I will be fine.
Your wounds are still open, so you must be careful…
There is no need to fret. I shall take my time returning on a secret path.
Until next we meet...
Indeed. Take care, Loreila.
